divs: Sighting DetailsMy cousin and I were walking in my uncle's hay field in Colvile, WA. He was walking about 5-10 feet in front of me. Out of no where I saw a ring of light on the ground around him flash three times. I told him about it, he didn't see it. He told me to not joke about something about that. I told I swear I saw it and wasn't messing around. Again he said don't joke about that. And again I told him I saw it. We got scared and decided to go back to the tent we were sleeping in. We talked for about thirty minutes and then decided to call it a night. I went to close up the tent (flap) door. As I was doing so, I was looking outside. Above the tree line, I saw an oval ball of light appear out t of the blue, fly horizontal for about three seconds and then completely disappear as fast as it appeared. I closed up the flap and told my cousin what I just saw, and we both were freaked out and tried to sleep as fast as possible. Nobody believes me when I tell this story since it was on the 4th of July, but I swear on anything that it happened, no firework could have caused this. I just read a story about a bunch of Texas residents recently saw UFO sightings, didn't know a site like this existed. And thought, even with this happening so long ago, had to at least share my story. I have another I will submit as well.
Summary: Circluar flash of light (ring) on ground Oval light, sky
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
trends: There have been no other sightings in Colville
This sighting has never been favorited.
